Structs/DALIMember.html#/s:4DALI10DALIMe.name: location
Structs/DALIMember.html#/s:4DALI10DALIMe.abstract: User’s chosen origin location (data used by mappy)

Structs/DALIMember.html#/s:4DALI10DALIMe.name: skills
Structs/DALIMember.html#/s:4DALI10DALIMe.abstract: A list of skills the user has listed for themselves

Structs/DALIMember.html#/s:4DALI10DALIMe.name: dirty
Structs/DALIMember.html#/s:4DALI10DALIMe.abstract: Signifies if data has been changed in the object without saving to the server

Structs/DALIMember.html#/s:4DALI10DALIMe.name: parse(_:)
Structs/DALIMember.html#/s:4DALI10DALIMe.abstract: Parses a json object and returns a DALIUser object if it can find all the required information

Structs/Observation.html.name: Observation
Structs/Observation.html.abstract: An object that allows the user to control socket observations.

Classes/DALIapi.html#/s:4DALI7DALIapiC6c.name: config
Classes/DALIapi.html#/s:4DALI7DALIapiC6c.abstract: The current configuration being used by the framework

Classes/DALIapi.html#/s:4DALI7DALIapiC10.name: isSignedIn
Classes/DALIapi.html#/s:4DALI7DALIapiC10.abstract: Defines if the user is signed in

Classes/DALIapi.html#/s:4DALI7DALIapiC15.name: SuccessCallback
Classes/DALIapi.html#/s:4DALI7DALIapiC15.abstract: A callback reporting either success or failure in the requested action

Classes/DALIapi.html#/s:4DALI7DALIapiC14.name: disableSockets()
Classes/DALIapi.html#/s:4DALI7DALIapiC14.abstract: Disables all sockets used by the API

Classes/DALIapi.html#/s:4DALI7DALIapiC6s.name: signin(authCode:done:)
Classes/DALIapi.html#/s:4DALI7DALIapiC6s.abstract: Signs in on the server using Google Signin provided server auth code

Classes/DALIapi.html#/s:4DALI7DALIapiC6s.name: signin(accessToken:refreshToken:done:)
Classes/DALIapi.html#/s:4DALI7DALIapiC6s.abstract: Signs in on the server using access and refresh tokens provided by Google Signin. Will not sign in if already signed in

Classes/DALIapi.html#/s:4DALI7DALIapiC6s.name: signin(accessToken:refreshToken:forced:done:)
Classes/DALIapi.html#/s:4DALI7DALIapiC6s.abstract: Signs in on the server using access and refresh tokens provided by Google Signin

Classes/DALIapi.html#/s:4DALI7DALIapiC18.name: silentMemberUpdate(callback:)
Classes/DALIapi.html#/s:4DALI7DALIapiC18.abstract: Silently updates the current member object from the server

Classes/DALIapi.html#/s:4DALI7DALIapiC7s.name: signOut()
Classes/DALIapi.html#/s:4DALI7DALIapiC7s.abstract: Signs out of your account on the API

Classes/DALIapi.html#/s:4DALI7DALIapiC22.name: sendSimpleNotification(with:and:to:callback:)
Classes/DALIapi.html#/s:4DALI7DALIapiC22.abstract: Sends a notification to EVERY device with the given tag set to true

Classes/DALILocation/Shared.html#/s:4DAL.name: get(callback:)
Classes/DALILocation/Shared.html#/s:4DAL.abstract: Get a list of all the people in the lab who are sharing their location

Classes/DALILocation/Shared.html#/s:4DAL.abstract: Submit the current location of the user

Classes/DALILocation/Tim.html#/s:4DALI12.name: current
Classes/DALILocation/Tim.html#/s:4DALI12.abstract: The most recent information on tim’s location

Classes/DALILocation/Tim.html#/s:4DALI12.name: get(callback:)
Classes/DALILocation/Tim.html#/s:4DALI12.abstract: Gets the current data on Tim’s Location and returns it.

Classes/DALILocation/Tim.html#/s:4DALI12.name: submit(inDALI:inOffice:callback:)
Classes/DALILocation/Tim.html#/s:4DALI12.abstract: Submit information about tim’s location. Will generate an error if user is not tim

Classes/DALILocation/Tim.html.name: Tim
Classes/DALILocation/Tim.html.abstract: A simple struct that holds booleans that indicate Tim’s location. Use it wisely ðŸ˜‰

Classes/DALILocation/Shared.html.name: Shared
Classes/DALILocation/Shared.html.abstract: A simple struct that handles getting a list of shared user

Classes/DALILocation.html#/s:4DALI12DALI.name: observeMemberEnter(callback:)
Classes/DALILocation.html#/s:4DALI12DALI.abstract: Observe members entering the lab. Will call callback everytime someone is tracked as entering the lab

Classes/DALILocation.html#/s:4DALI12DALI.name: sharing
Classes/DALILocation.html#/s:4DALI12DALI.abstract: The current user is sharing this device’s location

Classes/DALILights/Group.html#/s:4DALI10.name: formattedName
Classes/DALILights/Group.html#/s:4DALI10.abstract: The formatted name of the group for printing

Classes/DALILights/Group.html#/s:4DALI10.name: color
Classes/DALILights/Group.html#/s:4DALI10.abstract: The current color set for the group

Classes/DALILights/Group.html#/s:4DALI10.name: avgColor
Classes/DALILights/Group.html#/s:4DALI10.abstract: An average current color. Used for displaying state via color overlay

Classes/DALILights/Group.html.name: Group
Classes/DALILights/Group.html.abstract: A group of lights. This is defined as one of the rooms in DALI, each one a grouping of lights that can be controlled

Classes/DALIFood.html#/s:4DALI8DALIFoodC.name: current
Classes/DALIFood.html#/s:4DALI8DALIFoodC.abstract: The most recently gathered information on food

Classes/DALIFood.html#/s:4DALI8DALIFoodC.name: getFood(callback:)
Classes/DALIFood.html#/s:4DALI8DALIFoodC.abstract: Gets the current food for the night

Classes/DALIFood.html#/s:4DALI8DALIFoodC.name: setFood(food:callback:)
Classes/DALIFood.html#/s:4DALI8DALIFoodC.abstract: Sets the food listing for the night

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Config.htm.name: numSelected
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Config.htm.abstract: The number of options a user can select when voting

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Config.htm.name: ordered
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Config.htm.abstract: Boolean to indicate whether the user should put their options in order

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Config.htm.name: json()
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Config.htm.abstract: Get the JSON value of this config

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Option.htm.name: points
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Option.htm.abstract: The number of points the option has gotten. Only accessable by admin

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Option.htm.name: awards
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Option.htm.abstract: The awards this option has earned. Available only for admins or for events with results released

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Option.htm.name: isVotedFor
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Option.htm.abstract: A boolean to indicate if the user is voting for this one

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Option.htm.name: voteOrder
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Option.htm.abstract: An int to indicate the order (starting at 1 ending at numSelected). Only nescesary if event is ordered

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Option.htm.name: json()
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Option.htm.abstract: Get the JSON value of this option

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Option.htm.name: Option
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Option.htm.abstract: An option that a user can vote for.

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent.html#/s:4D.name: json()
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent.html#/s:4D.abstract: Converts the data stored in the event into a JSON format that the API will understand

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent.html#/s:4D.name: parse(_:)
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent.html#/s:4D.abstract: Parses a JSON object. May return nil if this is not a voting event or if it fails

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent.html#/s:4D.name: haveVoted(callback:)
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent.html#/s:4D.abstract: Get if the current device and user have already voted for this event

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent.html#/s:4D.name: getResults(callback:)
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent.html#/s:4D.abstract: Get the public results for this event

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent.html#/s:4D.name: getOptions(callback:)
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent.html#/s:4D.abstract: Get all the options for this event

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent.html#/s:4D.name: submitVote(options:callback:)
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent.html#/s:4D.abstract: Submit the given options as a vote

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent.html#/s:4D.name: saveResults(options:callback:)
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent.html#/s:4D.abstract: Save the awards given to the given options

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent.html#/s:4D.name: removeOption(option:callback:)
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent.html#/s:4D.abstract: Removes the given option from the list of options

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent.html#/s:4D.name: getReleasedEvents(callback:)
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent.html#/s:4D.abstract: Get all events that have results released

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent.html#/s:4D.name: get(callback:)
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent.html#/s:4D.abstract: Get voting events as an admin. The signed in user must be an admin, otherwise will exit immediately

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.name: name
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.abstract: Name of the event

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.name: description
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.abstract: Description of the event

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.name: location
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.abstract: Location of the event

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.name: start
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.abstract: Start time of the event

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.name: end
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.abstract: Start time of the event

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.name: id
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.abstract: The identifier used by the server

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.name: dirty
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.abstract: Signifies when this event object contains information that has not been saved

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.name: editable
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.abstract: A flag that indicates if this event can be edited

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.name: isNow
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.abstract: A flag that indicates if this event is happening now

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.name: init(name:description:location:start:end:)
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.abstract: Creates an event object

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.name: create(callback:)
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.abstract: Creates the event on the server

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.name: parse(_:)
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.abstract: Parses a given json object and returns an event object if it can find one

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.name: json()
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.abstract: Get the event in JSON form. Converts all data in the event into a form the API would use

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.name: getAll(callback:)
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.abstract: Pulls all the events from the server

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.name: observeAll(callback:)
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.abstract: Observes all events. Will call callback every time something changes

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.name: observeUpcoming(callback:)
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.abstract: Observes all upcoming events. Will call callback every time something changes

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.name: observeFuture(includeHidden:callback:)
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.abstract: Observe future events

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.name: observePublicUpcoming(callback:)
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.abstract: Observes public events.

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.name: getUpcoming(callback:)
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.abstract: Gets all upcoming events within a week from now

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.name: getPublicUpcoming(callback:)
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.abstract: Gets all upcoming events within a week from now that are public

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.name: getFuture(includeHidden:callback:)
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.abstract: Gets all events in the future

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.name: enableVoting(numSelected:ordered:callback:)
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.abstract: Enable voting on this event

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.name: checkIn(major:minor:callback:)
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.abstract: Checks in the current user to whatever event is happening now

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.name: enableCheckin(callback:)
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.abstract: Enables checkin on the event, and gets back major and minor values to be used when advertizing

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.name: getMembersCheckedIn(callback:)
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.abstract: Gets a list of members who have checked in

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.name: observeMembersCheckedIn(callback:)
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:4DALI9DALIEven.abstract: Observe the list of members whom have checked in

Classes/DALIError/General.html#/s:4DALI9.name: Unauthorized
Classes/DALIError/General.html#/s:4DALI9.abstract: The request did not have proper authorization

Classes/DALIError/General.html#/s:4DALI9.name: UnknownError(error:text:code:)
Classes/DALIError/General.html#/s:4DALI9.abstract: A unknown error has occured. Information about the error is stored. Code will be -1 if there is no code

Classes/DALIError/General.html#/s:4DALI9.name: InvalidJSON(text:jsonError:)
Classes/DALIError/General.html#/s:4DALI9.abstract: Response was not JSON! Text version is stored

Classes/DALIError/General.html#/s:4DALI9.name: Unprocessable
Classes/DALIError/General.html#/s:4DALI9.abstract: The data sent to the server was not able to be processed for whatever reason

Classes/DALIError/General.html#/s:4DALI9.name: BadRequest
Classes/DALIError/General.html#/s:4DALI9.abstract: The data sent was not valid for the route. Consult the documentation for the route you are using

Classes/DALIError/General.html#/s:4DALI9.name: UnexpectedResponse
Classes/DALIError/General.html#/s:4DALI9.abstract: The response to the request was not as expected. Consult the documentation for the route you are using

Classes/DALIError/General.html#/s:4DALI9.name: Unfound
Classes/DALIError/General.html#/s:4DALI9.abstract: The requested object(s) were not found on the server

Classes/DALIError/Create.html#/s:4DALI9D.name: AlreadyCreated
Classes/DALIError/Create.html#/s:4DALI9D.abstract: The object you are calling create on has already been created

Classes/DALIError/General.html.name: General
Classes/DALIError/General.html.abstract: Pertaining to the General opperations. Mostly used by the ServerCommunicator

Classes/DALIConfig.html#/s:4DALI10DALICo.name: sharingDefault
Classes/DALIConfig.html#/s:4DALI10DALICo.abstract: A default value for the sharing preference

Classes/DALIConfig.html#/s:4DALI10DALICo.name: enableSockets
Classes/DALIConfig.html#/s:4DALI10DALICo.abstract: Allows to enable or disable the use of sockets

Classes/DALIConfig.html#/s:4DALI10DALICo.name: socketAutoSwitching
Classes/DALIConfig.html#/s:4DALI10DALICo.abstract: Enables automatic connecting and disconnecting of sockets when going between forground and background

Classes/DALIConfig.html#/s:4DALI10DALICo.name: init(serverURL:apiKey:enableSockets:)
Classes/DALIConfig.html#/s:4DALI10DALICo.abstract: Initializes the configuration with a server url and an API key

Classes/DALIConfig.html.name: DALIConfig
Classes/DALIConfig.html.abstract: Configurations for the DALIapi framework can be stored and handled using this

Classes/DALIError.html.name: DALIError
Classes/DALIError.html.abstract: A set of errors used by the DALIapi framework to signal the user when there is an issue

Classes/DALIFood.html.name: DALIFood
Classes/DALIFood.html.abstract: An interface for getting and setting information about food in the lab

Classes/DALILights.html.name: DALILights
Classes/DALILights.html.abstract: A class for controlling the lights in the lab

Classes/DALILocation.html.name: DALILocation
Classes/DALILocation.html.abstract: A static struct that contains all location updates and queries

Classes/DALIPhoto.html.name: DALIPhoto
Classes/DALIPhoto.html.abstract: Photo class for getting a list of all photos from the API

Classes/DALIapi.html.name: DALIapi
Classes/DALIapi.html.abstract: Static class to configure and handle general requests for the DALI api framework
